topic.title: HPE Helion Development Platform 2.0: ALS Command Reference: Space Quotas

ul.li: helion create-space-quota: Create a new space quota.
helion delete-space-quota: Delete the named space quota.
helion rename-space-quota: Rename the named space quota.
helion set-space-quota: Assign the specified space quota to the current or specified space
helion space-quota: Show the details of the named space quota.
helion space-quotas: List the space quotas owned by the current, specified, or all organizations.
helion unset-space-quota: Drop the space quota from the current or specified space.
helion update-space-quota: Modify the named space quota.

section.title: Syntax
section.p: For more information, use the helion help or helion help [command] commands.

section.title: helion create-space-quota <name>
section.p: Create a new space quota. It will be owned by the current or specified organization.

row.entry: Amount of memory application instances can use. Use the suffices 'M' and 'G' for the convenient specification of mega- and gigabytes. Without a unit-suffix mega-bytes are assumed. As the base-unit megabytes must specified as integers. Gigabytes can be specified as fractions. Also accepts -1 and "unlimited" for unlimited memory.
